name: Black Lady
description:
A good night of rest in this old abandoned castle was unexpected after all you went through...

Unfortunately, it turned out to be a terrible night, especially when you dreamed about a black lady silently screaming and pointing the finger at you...

What does she want?

An unlucky encounter for Mörk Borg.

Improved 2.0 version with Heckin Viv (@discord) suggestions. Thanks!
